1.content:
You enter the hotel lobby dragging along the suitcase filled with clothes and other stuff you would need for the few days you were spending at this beachside resort.

“Good afternoon, how can I help you?” A young man at the check-in desk asks with a smile.

You smile back and reply, “I have a room for one reserved, under the name…
1.title: In the Lobby

choices: Later as you take a nap
Later on your way to the beach
11.content:
The young man quickly types your name into the computer. “Okay sir, your room’s in building two, level three. Here’s your key-card.” He says handing you the card.

“Thank you.” You reply before you head out of the lobby towards building two. On the way out you pass the employee lounge, the door is open and you see two girls, both at least 19 years old, in maid uniforms. One is a Hispanic with larger than average endowments, the other is a slightly shorter cute Asian girl. Outside you see a young blond woman step out of the building you’re headed for wearing a red bikini heading for the beach. The waves and chatter and laughter of other people, calling you to come. Maybe you’ll head to the beach after you’ve checked out your room.

After entering the building and taking the elevator up to level three you come to your door. You swipe the key-card and unlock. You go inside and see that the room was quite worth the money you spent. You immediately head into the bedroom and set your suitcase down on the dresser. You notice on the dresser there is a small green bottle labeled “scented bath oil”. You figured you may as well try it right now, nothing significant is going to happen for a few hours. You start the tub filling and get undressed. Once the tub is nearly full you turn off the water and pour in the bottle. The fresh scent of mint wafts up as you settle into the tub.

After about an hour you reluctantly let the tub drain and dry yourself off, pondering what to do next.



When& where do you shrink?
11.title: Jeff Michaels

111.content:
All of a sudden you feel odd, a strange tingling sensation all over your body.

You wake up later in what seems to be a large tent, only now realizing you passed out. It takes a moment or two before you realize that the “tent” you’re in is your shirt. You’ve shrunk!

As you finally manage to get yourself out of your shirt, you hear the door to you hotel room opening.

It’s…
111.title: Shrunken guest

choices: You Just stand there and stare
1113.content: Carefully a Women, maybe in her mid twenties entered the room. She seemed to be the executive housekeeper or something because she looked quite official with her black low heeled pumps, the midlength skirt and the Jacket, wearing a white blouse beneath. Her blonde hair was tied in a ponitail which crawled beneath her shoulders. "Mr. Michaels", she whispered. You just stood there and stared at the terrificly gigantic women. "She must stand more than 200 ft" you whisper to yourself. She closed the door behind her and called your name again a little louder. Carefully she scanned the floor as she took slow, deliberate steps. She knew you where there but still you could just stand there and stare - unable to move. Then your glances exchanged. A broad smile appeared on her pretty face and she crossed her arms. Then walked straight to you. You trie to run but your Body didn't want to. Every muscle in your body was tensed to the maximum.
1113.title: Someone else

choices: you are still on the floor
You are on the palm of her hand
11133.content:
The encounter with something so giagantic was simply too much for your body and your mind. Every muscle in your body went from maximum tension to zero and you collaps onto the soft carpet. You here the laughter of the women as a fading echo as your contiousnes was fading out slowly.

As you woke up...
11133.title: You pass out

choices: On your way to the conference
After the conference when you go to the beach
12.content:
The young man quickly types your name into the computer. “Okay ma’am, your room’s in building two, level three. Here’s your key-card.” He says handing you the card.

“Thank you.” You reply before you head out of the lobby towards building two. On the way out you pass the employee lounge, the door is open and you see two girls, both at least 19 years old, in maid uniforms. One is a Hispanic with larger than average endowments, the other is a slightly shorter cute Asian girl. Outside you see a young blond woman step out of the building you’re headed for wearing a red bikini heading for the beach. The waves and chatter and laughter of other people, calling you to come. Maybe you’ll head to the beach after the conference is over.

After entering the building and taking the elevator up to level three you come to your door. You swipe the key-card and unlock. You go inside and see that the room was quite worth the money the company spent. You immediately head into the bedroom and set your suitcase down on the dresser. You notice on the dresser there is a small green bottle labeled “scented bath oil”. You figured you may as well try it right now, nothing significant is going to happen for a few hours. You start the tub filling and get undressed. Once the tub is nearly full you turn off the water and pour in the bottle. The fresh scent of mint wafts up as you settle into the tub.

After about an hour you reluctantly let the tub drain and dry yourself off, and start preparing for the conference.


When& where do you shrink?
12.title: Elizabeth Wilson

121.content:
All of a sudden you feel odd, a strange tingling sensation all over your body.

You wake up later in what seems to be a large tent, only now realizing you passed out. It takes a moment or two before you realize that the “tent” you’re in is your shirt. You’ve shrunk!

As you finally manage to get yourself out of your shirt, you hear the door to you hotel room opening.

It’s…
121.title: Now in your room

1211.content:
“Housekeeping.” The young Latina woman calls out as she closes the door behind her, you can hear the slight Spanish accent she has. “Hello, anyone here?” She calls out again as she steps into the main living area, now you realize how loud she is to your small ears. As she comes closer to the hall where you and your now way too big clothes are you see a nametag on her uniform identifying her as Julia.

As Julia approaches, you start to wonder if you should try to get her attention, maybe she would help you get back to normal. But then again, maybe she would use your size to her advantage. Before Julia takes another step towards you…
1211.title: A giantess named Julia

12111.content:
“What the-!” Julia exclaims looking right at you. “Is that, is that a tiny person?”

You know there’s no point in running now that she’s seen you, so you wave your arms and shout for her help. Julia takes another few steps towards you before kneeling down and grabbing you. “I remember you, I saw you passing by the lounge earlier. How’d this happen?” She asks.

“I’m not sure.” You reply, “I came into my room and took a bath, using that scented bath oil on the dresser.”

When you finish Julia’s mouth is…
12111.title: Spotted

121112.content:
“It worked! For a while there I thought that gypsy cheated me.” Julia said excitedly.

“What?! You planned this?” You shout in disbelief.

“Not entirely. I just stuck the shrinking potion, what you thought was bath oil, in a random room. If it didn’t work nothing would go wrong. But if the potion did work, which obviously it did, and I found the one it shrank, I could live out my dream.” Julia explained, looking at you with some strange longing.

“What dream is that?” You ask nervously.

Julia smiles again and replies…
121112.title: Uh-oh

1211122.content: What other dream could Julia fulfill with you?
1211122.title: More choices

choices: Never! you crazy! Bitch! I want my size again!
Afraid, you beg, please help me!
12111221.content: From today, you will be my slave, everything I ask will do. If you refuse, you will be punished in several ways. Understood insect ...
12111221.title: "To have a little pet/slave."

12111222.content: After this one you can make your own options
12111222.title: Still more choices

choices: She unbirths you right there in the living room
She goes to the bedroom to unbirth you
121112221.content:
“What!?” you shout, “How is shrinking me going give you a baby?”

“Well, you see… I’m infertile…” Julia said, blushing with embarrassment, “Since I don’t have any eggs in my ovaries there is no natural way I could conceive. So after a while I decided to try something supernatural. I came across a gypsy who agreed to help me and told me what I needed to do. The first step was to shrink someone. In this case you, that was what the shrinking potion was for. Now it’s time for the second step.”

Julia then stuffed you into her cleavage, a wise choice on her part since the bra she was wearing made her globes press against you, making you unable to move. From your prison you saw Julia take a small purple bottle out of her pocket, a bottle not unlike the one you found the shrinking potion in. Julia took the cork out of the mouth of the bottle and then drank the contents in one gulp. “There. That takes care of step two. Now for step three.” She said as she fished you out of her cleavage.

“What is step three? And what was that stuff.” You asked.

“Step three is where I put you into my womb. That potion will allow me to then make you my child.” Julia said with a lusty smile.
121112221.title: Julia’s Child

12112.content: As Julia's enormous feet approach you, you decide that you can't trust her. You need a place to hide, and fast. You run as fast as you can, towards....
12112.title: You hide

12131.content:
Elizabeth stood in awe as her colleague Mary Anderson enter the room. Mary was a 42-year old divorcee with two teenage daughters, who were both accompaying their mother on this trip. The two at work had a sort of friendly rivelry.

"LIZ." the giantess boomed. "ARE YOU THERE?" By her new shrunken perspective, Mary appeared as tall as a 20 story building. Mary noticed the pile of cloths on the floor and walked towards it.

Still in shock from her suddent transformation, Liz felt the floor shake as Mary's collosal feet quickly headed towards her. At the last second, she quickly ran to the side to avoid being crushed by Mary's black ten-foot high heels.

"LIZ?" Mary boomed again.

Her heart raced as she looked up at Mary. Mary looked down right at Liz and ...
12131.title: Mary, her co-worker

121311.content: Maria looks at you on the floor and says: friend! What happened? You say that you came and took a bath, waking up shrunken. Maria is amazed and decides to help. I'll take you to my room, but no one can see you in this size, Maria.
121311.title: recognizes Liz.

124.content:
Hours of boredom fly by during the conference. Long talks about the company you work for and its future. A round of applause for a gray haired executive retiring and his successor. A few progress reports, and financial numbers. You spend a lot of time schmoozing up to your superiors to try and get a promotion, but all you got was your ass groped. As soon as you could, you left.

If there's one good thing about this trip, it had to be the beach. White sand, clear blue water, and scantily clad beach goers. Once you get back to your room, you tear off the stuffy pants suit you've been wearing and change. You brought along a sexy black one piece that shows off a good amount of cleavage, your trim belly, and half of your butt. Grabbing a beach towel, a good book, a plastic chair, and a parasol you head to the beach.

Even after hours in the conference, the sun was still high in the sky. You find a good spot and set up. Sitting under the shade of your parasol, you enjoy the peaceful environment. All of a sudden you start to feel dizzy. You try to stand but then everything goes black...

You snap awake some time later under a heavy cloth. You struggle and claw against it before your head meets the open air. You see the underside of your umbrella...miles up in the air. You were shrunk!

"Huh, someone just left all their stuff here...might as well use it!" a cheerful voice says. Looking up, you see...
124.title: To the beach!

choices: Decide to sit on the chair, a fat ass will crush you. NOOO !!!
She looks at you in surprise.
She watches you with a smile.
1242.content: A maid who was already off, she was brunette, Breasts D, Fat Bunda, a little fat in the belly, still sexy for any man. You were in the chair, and you start jumping to get attention. The brunette maid then ...
1242.title: An off-duty maid

info.brief_description: You are either Jeff or Elizabeth. While on vacation/a business trip you shrink! Please add
info.description:
In this story you take on the role of Jeff, a vacationing college student, or Elizabeth, a young business woman on a business trip. But after signing in and arriving in your room, you mysteriously shrink to about 2 inches tall! Will the hotel staff help you, or keep you for themselves?

If you add, which I hope you do, please follow these guidelines:

1. No toilet stuff! (I don't know why some people like it, and I don't want to know)
2. I really would appreciate no interaction with giant males. I'm sorry but it's just the way I am
3.Sex allowed (Just don't go overboard on it)*
*I'll allow guy on girl, and girl on girl stuff, but NO guy on guy.
4. At least try to use proper spelling and grammar
5. Try for at least a paragraph (You can do one-liners for choice chapters but you should then do one of those choices)
6. Keep consistent!
7. swears and cusses are allowed to a degree
8. Please respect any and all choices marked reserved

Other than that, go nuts!

*Disclaimer: I reserve the right to edit and/or delete chapters as I see fit*
